sentences.en: He decided to sacrifice a trip for a new house.
sentences.cn: 为了购买新房子,他决定放弃旅行.

sentences.en: He is ready to sacrifice inclination to his country.
sentences.cn: 为了祖国的利益他乐于牺牲个人所好.

sentences.en: He sacrificed a promising career to look after his kids.
sentences.cn: 他为了照看孩子牺牲了很有前途的事业。

sentences.en: He was endowed with the spirit of self - sacrifice .
sentences.cn: 他富有 自我牺牲 精神.

sentences.en: He was forced to sacrifice his house.
sentences.cn: 他被迫廉价出售他的房子.

sentences.en: He was willing to make any sacrifice for peace.
sentences.cn: 他愿意为和平作出任何牺牲。

sentences.en: I thanked my parents for all their self-sacrifice on my behalf.
sentences.cn: 我感谢父母为我做出的所有自我牺牲。

sentences.en: I would never dream of asking you to make such a sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 我决没想到要你做出这样的牺牲.

sentences.en: It's wrong to sacrifice quality to quantity.
sentences.cn: 牺牲质量去追求数量是错误的.

sentences.en: Others promised to "shed our blood and sacrifice our lives to oppose the invaders".
sentences.cn: 其他人承诺要“抛头颅、洒热血、抗击侵略者”。

sentences.en: She brought three children up single-handedly, often at great personal sacrifice .
sentences.cn: 她独自一人把三个孩子带大，常常需要作出巨大的个人牺牲。

sentences.en: She brought three children up single-handedly, often at great personal sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 她独自一人把三个孩子带大，常常需要作出巨大的个人牺牲。

sentences.en: She sacrificed family life to her career.
sentences.cn: 她为了她的事业牺牲了家庭生活。

sentences.en: Should motherhood necessarily mean sacrifice and self-denial?
sentences.cn: 做母亲就一定要牺牲和忘我吗？

sentences.en: the courage and self-sacrifice of those who fought in the war
sentences.cn: 投身战争的人的勇气和自我牺牲精神

sentences.en: The great magicians of old always invoked their gods with sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 旧时一些有名的巫师经常以祭品祈求他们所供奉神灵的助佑。

sentences.en: The minister stressed the need for economic sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 部长强调了在经济上作出牺牲的必要性。

sentences.en: The priest sacrificed a chicken.
sentences.cn: 牧师献祭了一只鸡。

sentences.en: The workforce were willing to make sacrifices in order to preserve jobs.
sentences.cn: 雇员为了保住饭碗情愿作出牺牲。

sentences.en: They killed a sheep as a sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 他们宰了一只羊作为祭品.

sentences.en: They made sacrifices to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.cn: 他们举行献祭以保丰收。

sentences.en: We know how to work, to sacrifice, and to fight.
sentences.cn: 我们懂得如何去工作,去战斗, 去作出牺牲.

sentences.en: We sacrifice our personal lives to our work.
sentences.cn: 我们为工作牺牲了私人生活。
